snippet: A six-foot-long box of doughnuts arrived at Madison Square Park on Friday morning as part of National Doughnut Day, which Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg has supported in a proclamation.
abstract: A six-foot-long box of doughnuts arrived at Madison Square Park on Friday morning as part of National Doughnut Day, which Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg has supported in a proclamation.

headline.main: Madison Square Park, 6:52 A.M., Donut Day
